name: RI_1_1_11_1_Evidence_of_Record_Entry_Pseudomynization_Event
title: RI.1.1.11.1 Evidence of Record Entry Pseudomynization Event (Function)
description: Maintain Evidence of Record Entry Pseudomynization Event
purpose: Evidence of Record Entry Pseudomynization Event includes key metadata, ensures health record integrity (and trust) and enables record audit.

statement.label: RI.1.1.11.1#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence when a Record Entry content is pseudomynized.

statement.label: RI.1.1.11.1#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization where Record Entry content is pseudomynized.

statement.label: RI.1.1.11.1#03
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the patient who is subject of pseudomynized Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.11.1#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the user pseudomynizing Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.11.1#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system application which pseudomynized Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.11.1#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the type of Record Event trigger (i.e., pseudomynize).

statement.label: RI.1.1.11.1#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time Record Entry content is pseudomynized.

statement.label: RI.1.1.11.1#08
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture identity of the location (i.e., network address) where the Record Entry content is pseudomynized.

statement.label: RI.1.1.11.1#09
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture the rationale for pseudomynizing Record Entry content.
